title: National Velvet (Captioned)
creator_credit: Clarence Brown, Pandro S. Berman and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
brief_description: Based on the novel “National Velvet” by Enid Bagnold, this is the incredible story of a girl who rides to victory in the celebrated Grand National at Aintree, England. Velvet Brown, a young girl passionately interested in horses wins a horse in a raffle and with the help of Mi, an ex-jockey, sets out to win the greatest steeplechase in the world, the Grand National. Stars Elizabeth Taylor and Mickey Rooney. Rated: G
